title: Different Champion Voice
body:
*I'm not always here so if this had been already asked/answer please link it below*

Is it possible to change in-game Champion Voice? Into Japanes/Korean Voice?
And How to do it?

Advanve tnx for answers

replies.body:
It's possible to change the voice out of game by editing game files. This is a break of the terms of service though, even if it's for aesthetic sake.

It's also possible if you select a different server, as you'll be patched to get the correct sound files for that 'version' of the game.
